articles.title: All About Chloropicrin, The Chemical Gas Russia Is Using Against Ukraine - NDTV
articles.description: US has accused Russia of using banned choking gas Chloropicrin to drive out Ukrainian troops on Thursday as it launches its biggest advance in the eastern European country two years into its military invasion.
articles.content:
A soldier stuck in trenches, must either flee under enemy fire or risk suffocating. (Representational)
US has accused Russia of using banned choking gas Chloropicrin to drive out Ukrainian troops on… [+2136 chars]
